title: (x) Steelroots logo - Gillies Gothic (customized) {Grant}
content:
[http://steelroots.com/main.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222103/http:/steelroots.com/main.asp)   
   
The Steel Roots logo type is? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222103im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
author: hildebrant

comments.content: It's [Gillies Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222103/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/090159000.html) with the 'e' and 'o' characters modified to look squarish.
